meanings: (수를 헤아림) reckoning, [명사] calculation, figures; (간단한) sum, [동사] calculate, reckon, (formal) compute
(이해를 따짐, 상황을 판단함) [명사] calculation, consideration, [동사] calculate, consider

vlive.korean: 계산? I have to pay? 듣기 View video MAP6 : MAP6의 추석특집릴레이방송-제이준
다 같이 계산하면 되죠? We need to calculate all together, right? 듣기 View video ITZY : ITZY(있지) IT'z TOURBOOK in USA EP10
vlive.english: We need to calculate all together, right?

vlive.korean: 여러분 이제 계산대로 모여주시겠습니까? Everyone, can you gather around the cashier? 듣기 View video ITZY : ITZY(있지) IT'z TOURBOOK in USA EP10
vlive.english: Everyone, can you gather around the cashier?

vlive.korean: 내 계산이었어요 - 뭔지 알죠? It was my calculation. - You know, right? 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : [Replay] BLACKPINK ‘How You Like That’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: It was my calculation. - You know, right?

vlive.korean: 꼴등이 있어요? 꼴등도 계산을 했어요? We have the last place? Did you calculate who came last? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
vlive.english: We have the last place? Did you calculate who came last?

examples.korean: The diet is based on counting calories. 발음듣기 그 다이어트는 칼로리 계산에 기준을 두고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The diet is based on counting calories. 발음

examples.korean: By my reckoning you still owe me ￡5. 발음듣기 내 계산으로는 네가 아직 내게 5파운드를 줄 게 있는 것 같은데. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: By my reckoning you still owe me ￡5. 발음

examples.korean: He had miscalculated how long the trip would take. 발음듣기 그는 그 여행이 얼마나 오래 걸릴 것인지를 잘못 계산했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had miscalculated how long the trip would take. 발음

examples.korean: to send/issue/settle an invoice for the goods 발음듣기 물품 대금 청구서[송장]를 보내다/발송하다/처리하다[청구서대로 계산해 주다] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to send/issue/settle an invoice for the goods 발음

examples.korean: Is your math correct? 발음듣기 네가 계산한 게 맞니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
